text: The Governor of Santa Fe () is a citizen of Santa Fe Province, in Argentina, holding the office of governor for a period of time. Right now, the governor of Santa Fe is Maximiliano Pullaro, of the UCR Party. According to the Constitution of the province, the governor of the province is elected directly by the people of Santa Fe by simple majority of votes for a four-year term. He does not have the possibility of immediate re-election, but he can run again once at least one term has passed between his first term and the next, just like the presidential elections in Uruguay. ==References== Category:Lists of governors Category:Santa Fe Province
title: Governor of Santa Fe Province
